document.full_text: last year's wimbledon runner-up tomas berdych survived a major first-round scare at the halle open on tuesday, saving three match points to struggle past 169th ranked belgian ruben bemelmans 5-7 7-6 6-4.
document.title: top seed berdych saves match points to advance in halle
lines_and_colors: last year's wimbledon runner-up tomas berdych survived a major first-round scare at the halle open on tuesday, saving three match points to struggle past 169th ranked belgian ruben bemelmans 5-7 7-6 6-4.
